verses.verse: For Zion's <S%H4616>sake<s%> <S%H6726><s%> will I <S%H3808>not<s%> hold my <S%H2814>peace,<s%> and for Jerusalem's <S%H4616>sake<s%> <S%H3389><s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8252>rest,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> thereof go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as <S%H5051>brightness,<s%> and the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> thereof as a <S%H3940>lamp<s%> that <S%H1197>burneth.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> thy <S%H3519>glory:<s%> and thou shalt be <S%H7121>called<s%> by a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5344>name.<s%>

Thou shalt also <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and a <S%H4410>royal<s%> <S%H6797>diadem<s%> in the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H5800>Forsaken;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall thy <S%H776>land<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H8077>Desolate:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> thou shalt be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2657>Hephzibah,<s%> and thy <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1166>Beulah:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in thee, and thy <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H1166>married.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> as a young <S%H970>man<s%> <S%H1166>marrieth<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> so shall thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1166>marry<s%> thee: and as the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H4885>rejoiceth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> so shall thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee.

I have <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> which shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H8548><s%> hold their <S%H2814>peace<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night:<s%> ye that make <S%H2142>mention<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> keep not <S%H408>silence,<s%> <S%H1824><s%>

And <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H1824>rest,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H3559>establish,<s%> and <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and by the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of his <S%H5797>strength,<s%> Surely I will <S%H518>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1715>corn<s%> to be <S%H3978>meat<s%> for thine <S%H341>enemies;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>stranger<s%> shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H8492>wine,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast labored: <S%H3021><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> they that have <S%H622>gathered<s%> it shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it, and <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they that have brought it <S%H6908>together<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> it in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of my <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

Go <S%H5674>through,<s%> go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H6437>prepare<s%> ye the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> cast <S%H5549>up,<s%> cast <S%H5549>up<s%> the <S%H4546>highway;<s%> gather <S%H5619>out<s%> the <S%H4480>stones;<s%> <S%H68><s%> lift <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H8085>proclaimed<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>world,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> ye to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%> <S%H935>cometh;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H7939>reward<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> him, and his <S%H6468>work<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> them, The <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and thou shalt be <S%H7121>called,<s%> Sought <S%H1875>out,<s%> A <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%>
